video_prompt: A cartoon strawberry character with glossy, translucent features, blushes, and a frilly skirt moves playfully, its bright colors shifting. Subtle shadows beneath it deepen with its motion against a plain white background. Its happy expression subtly changes.
image_prompt: A cute, whimsical, cartoon-style strawberry character with a glossy red strawberry head, yellow seeds, and a green calyx. It has large, innocent black eyes, a gentle smile, and tiny pink blushes. The character wears a bright green top and a frilly, translucent green bubble skirt. Its arms and legs are slender and soft pink, with rounded hands and feet. The character stands on a plain white background with subtle shadows.
refined_video_prompt: A playful character moves, its bright colors dynamically shifting. Its translucent, glossy surface catches and distorts light with each sway, while its frilly base bounces. Subtle blushes deepen and fade on its cheeks, as its happy expression subtly evolves. Shadows beneath it fluidly deepen and shift with its motion.
